content: 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in corner * skip 1 st double_crochet in next 2 sts chain 1 skip chain-1 space double_crochet in next 3 sts chain 1 skip chain-1 space double_crochet in next 3 sts chain 1 repeat 7 times skip chain-1 space double_crochet in next 2 sts skip last st ** 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in corner * repeat from * to * 2 times and from * to ** once join to top of beginning chain-2 with a slip_stitch finish off 136 double_crochet round 11 join color a with a slip_stitch in any corner chain 1 3 single_crochet in corner single_crochet in next st * chain 1 skip 1 st or chain-1 space single_crochet in next st repeat across to corner ** 3 single_crochet in corner * repeat from * to * 2 times and from * to ** once join to beginning single_crochet finish off 100 single_crochet created by donna mason-svara aka smoothfoxlover@yahoo com ©2009 this pattern has not been tested please notify me of any pattern corrections i will answer any and all questions you may have with the instructions do not plagiarize this pattern all patterns are my original designs please do not re-sell my patterns or give them away for free or post my patterns on the internet you may sell items you make from my patterns at craft fairs fund raisers or custom orders for friends and family but please do not sell finished items on the internet without my written permission do not claim designs as your own this pattern is copyrighted by me and i give my permission for you to post pictures of items made from my pattern on your website if you will post a link back to my etsy store if the pattern is for sale if the pattern is free please direct people to my blog be sure to list the name smoothfox as the designer
